title: Musical 「Kuroshitsuji」 -Emerald Witch and Werewolves’ Forest-
overview: England, 19th Century — Sebastian Michaelis, the loyal butler of the distinguished Phantomhive family, works alongside his 13-year-old master, Ciel Phantomhive as the “Queen’s Watchdog,” carrying out the dirty work of the underworld on Her Majesty’s behalf. When a string of inexplicable deaths in Germany draws the Queen’s attention, Sebastian and Ciel are dispatched to uncover the truth. Their investigation leads them deep into the ominous “Forest of Werewolves,” a place rumored to kill anyone who dares to set foot within. But as they dig deeper into the mystery, a dreadful curse begins to take hold.
